Text.Language: Attend church and recite the readings / Beat your chest during the prayers / He who does not love his brother / Lives in the midst of the darkness

How beautiful are the epistles / Sweeter than the honeycomb / Saint Paulâ€™s words restored the disobedient / Both, free and slaves, men and women

The house of worship and guidance / Is the Orthodox Church / The house of angels and soldiers+ / The house of the Christian nation

[Living] water is available in Her / For the salvation of humanity / As mentioned in the Song of Songs / The homilies and the Didascalia+

The mother is joyful in her children / When they are thirsty, she quenches them / Their vessels are always full / The dwellers in her are given drink
